parameters.name: imagePipelineArn
parameters.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the image pipeline that you want to retrieve.

nested_items.name: requestId
nested_items.description: The request ID that uniquely identifies this request.

nested_items.name: imagePipeline
nested_items.description: The image pipeline object.

nested_items.name: arn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the image pipeline.

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: The name of the image pipeline.

nested_items.name: description
nested_items.description: The description of the image pipeline.

nested_items.name: platform
nested_items.description: The platform of the image pipeline.

nested_items.name: enhancedImageMetadataEnabled
nested_items.description: Collects additional information about the image being created, including the operating system (OS) version and package list. This information is used to enhance the overall experience of using EC2 Image Builder. Enabled by default.

nested_items.name: imageRecipeArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the image recipe associated with this image pipeline.

nested_items.name: containerRecipeArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the container recipe that is used for this pipeline.

nested_items.name: infrastructureConfigurationArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the infrastructure configuration associated with this image pipeline.

nested_items.name: distributionConfigurationArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the distribution configuration associated with this image pipeline.

nested_items.name: imageTestsConfiguration
nested_items.description: The image tests configuration of the image pipeline.

nested_items.name: imageTestsEnabled
nested_items.description: Determines if tests should run after building the image. Image Builder defaults to enable tests to run following the image build, before image distribution.

nested_items.name: timeoutMinutes
nested_items.description: The maximum time in minutes that tests are permitted to run.

nested_items.name: scheduleExpression
nested_items.description: The cron expression determines how often EC2 Image Builder evaluates your pipelineExecutionStartCondition.

nested_items.name: timezone
nested_items.description: The timezone that applies to the scheduling expression. For example, 'Etc/UTC', 'America/Los_Angeles' in the IANA timezone format. If not specified this defaults to UTC.

nested_items.name: pipelineExecutionStartCondition
nested_items.description: The start condition configures when the pipeline should trigger a new image build, as follows. If no value is set Image Builder defaults to EXPRESSION_MATCH_AND_DEPENDENCY_UPDATES_AVAILABLE.

When you use semantic version filters on the base image or components in your image recipe, EC2 Image Builder builds a new image only when there are new versions of the base image or components in your recipe that match the filter.

nested_items.name: status
nested_items.description: The status of the image pipeline.

nested_items.name: dateCreated
nested_items.description: The date on which this image pipeline was created.

nested_items.name: dateUpdated
nested_items.description: The date on which this image pipeline was last updated.

nested_items.name: dateLastRun
nested_items.description: This is no longer supported, and does not return a value.

nested_items.name: dateNextRun
nested_items.description: The next date when the pipeline is scheduled to run.
(string) ---
(string) ---

nested_items.name: imageScanningConfiguration
nested_items.description: Contains settings for vulnerability scans.

nested_items.name: imageScanningEnabled
nested_items.description: A setting that indicates whether Image Builder keeps a snapshot of the vulnerability scans that Amazon Inspector runs against the build instance when you create a new image.

nested_items.name: ecrConfiguration
nested_items.description: Contains Amazon ECR settings for vulnerability scans.

nested_items.name: repositoryName
nested_items.description: The name of the container repository that Amazon Inspector scans to identify findings for your container images. The name includes the path for the repository location. If you don't provide this information, Image Builder creates a repository in your account named image-builder-image-scanning-repository for vulnerability scans of your output container images.

nested_items.name: containerTags
nested_items.description: Tags for Image Builder to apply to the output container image that Amazon Inspector scans. Tags can help you identify and manage your scanned images.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: executionRole
nested_items.description: The name or Amazon Resource Name (ARN) for the IAM role you create that grants Image Builder access to perform workflow actions.

nested_items.name: workflows
nested_items.description: Contains the workflows that run for the image pipeline.

nested_items.name: workflowArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the workflow resource.

nested_items.name: parameters
nested_items.description: Contains parameter values for each of the parameters that the workflow document defined for the workflow resource.

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: The name of the workflow parameter to set.

nested_items.name: value
nested_items.description: Sets the value for the named workflow parameter.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: parallelGroup
nested_items.description: Test workflows are defined within named runtime groups called parallel groups. The parallel group is the named group that contains this test workflow. Test workflows within a parallel group can run at the same time. Image Builder starts up to five test workflows in the group at the same time, and starts additional workflows as others complete, until all workflows in the group have completed. This field only applies for test workflows.

nested_items.name: onFailure
nested_items.description: The action to take if the workflow fails.
